Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a clean and efficient energy utilization technology.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: Partial oxidation reforming (POX) can be used to simplify the SOFC system structure, but its lower hydrogen production rate deteriorates the system performance.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: A wise method may be combining anode off gas recirculation (AOGR) and cathode off gas recirculation (COGR) with POX.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: Thus, their influence on the coupled system of intermediate temperature SOFC and POX is researched in detail in this paper.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: Results show that the reforming process gradually changes from exothermic to endothermic as AOGR rate increases.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: Meanwhile, its oxygen demand declines sharply and the process can even be self-sustained without external air input at the AOGR rate of 0.5 and 0.6.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: The application of AOGR can improve electrical efficiency by up to 51%, but at the expense of thermal efficiency.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: Excessive AOGR rates will result in decreased cell voltage and insufficient energy supply to the after-burner, so it should be restricted within a reasonable range and the best recommended value is 0.5.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: The application of COGR has little effect on fuel line parameters, so it causes little deterioration in electrical efficiency while improving thermal efficiency.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: Besides, the cell voltage is also insensitive to it.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer

Sentencas: The combination of AOGR and COGR can obtain better fuel economy and larger cogeneration scale simultaneously at the cost of a tiny electrical output power, while an optimal balance between three efficiencies is also achieved.
Titulo: Influence of Off Gas Recirculation on the Intermediate Temperature SOFC With Partial Oxidation Reformer
